name: override_clothes_model
description: What material model to use for the clothes (and most body parts such as hair and eyebrows)
label: Clothes material
items: Do not set a material at all, no matter what is said in the preset
Use the material model specified in the preset
Use a simplistic PBR-style material for the clothes, without any procedural aspects at all. This is geared towards export to external applications
Use texture-based material for the clothes, without any particular procedural aspects. This is the material which is closest to the original MakeHuman materials
